original_text: For a fire is kindled in mine anger, and shall burn unto the lowest hell, and shall consume the earth with her increase, and set on fire the foundations of the mountains.
korean_text: 그러므로 내 분노의 불이 일어나서 스올의 깊은 곳까지 불사르며 땅과 그 소산을 삼키며 산들의 터도 불타게 하는도다

sentences.original_text: For a fire is kindled in mine anger
and shall burn unto the lowest hell
and shall consume the earth with her increase
and set on fire the foundations of the mountains
